displayName.text: Pink Wonderland New York - Christmas Bar

formattedAddress: 53 W 21st St, New York, NY 10010, USA

authorAttributions.displayName: Pink Wonderland New York - Christmas Bar
Pink Wonderland New York - Christmas Bar
Pink Wonderland New York - Christmas Bar

adrFormatAddress: 53 W 21st St, New York, NY 10010, USA

originalText.text: Wasn’t what I expected. Place was a bar/club, had good music and pink everything but not worth a $40 entrance fee. Service was great though.

text.text: Wasn’t what I expected. Place was a bar/club, had good music and pink everything but not worth a $40 entrance fee. Service was great though.

originalText.text:
There are 2 main photo ops- sled and angel wings. It was sooo crowded. There are maybe 3-4 tables ( standing only) that are first come first served, the rest are blocked off VIP booths. I bought a Black Fri sale ( buy one ticket, get one free, so I only spent $35 or I would be so mad. Definitely not worth the price at all.
Long long lines to get a drink. Very few photo opps too.
Do not recommend .

originalText.text: This place is nothing but a cash grab. The photos and videos online look really good. However, in person is a totally different experience. They basically wrapped all the tables and booths in wrapping paper and pink suede-like fabric. All the fabric is dirty. The fabric on the seats is badly placed and coming off. The sleigh is dirty. To pay for entry is ridiculous with how terrible it is in person. We were out of there in 5 minutes.

text.text: This place is nothing but a cash grab. The photos and videos online look really good. However, in person is a totally different experience. They basically wrapped all the tables and booths in wrapping paper and pink suede-like fabric. All the fabric is dirty. The fabric on the seats is badly placed and coming off. The sleigh is dirty. To pay for entry is ridiculous with how terrible it is in person. We were out of there in 5 minutes.

originalText.text:
I had a great time. No wait for entry but at 9 pm the coat check was already fully. But, I came back in 15 mins and was able to check my coat. I didn’t get any of the holiday drink specials, I ordered my usual mix which was nice and strong. Many bartenders so the wait time was limited. Staff were friendly- no complaints, but 60 just for the entry (maybe it was cheaper if I brought it in advanced but I brought it the night before). It should be half that price or include 1 drink. I ordered 3 top shelf doubles for 91 including tip. I’d come back next year, if ticket prices don’t increase. Not many photo backdrops, only 2 that I saw. The wings (in the photo) and the sled, which has a very long line. We waited until the end of the night and the line for the sled was short so we were able to get pics there too but the decor was awesome enough, I didn’t really come for the photo ops. DJ was great, I enjoyed the wide variety of music from Christmas jams to reggaeton, reggae, pop and hip hop so needless to say my friends and I didn’t need or seek out a table.

I like how flexible the tickets are, I was running late and needed to change my entrance time and I was able to do that easily just 1hr in advanced. I ended up arriving 15 minutes after the entrance time I changed it to lol (I’m always late) and everything was fine.

originalText.text: I had the best time at pink wonderland!!!!! My ticket came with entrance to the beautifully decorated venue, a cute pink Santa hat and a light up necklace & you have to try the mint to be cocktail if you come! Staff was super friendly and helpful, I would definitely add this to your NY Christmas itinerary
